links.content:

## 2023 NEWS

##### 11.13.2023- Astrotech Reports First Quarter of Fiscal Year 2024 Financial Results

​Astrotech Corporation (Nasdaq: ASTC) (the “Company” or “Astrotech”) reported its financial results for the first quarter of fiscal year 2024, which ended September 30, 2023.

[Read more](https://www.astrotechcorp.com/2023-11-13-press-release)

[Read more](https://www.astrotechcorp.com/2023-09-28-press-release)

##### 9.28.2023- Astrotech Reports Fiscal Year 2023 Financial Results

Astrotech Corporation (Nasdaq: ASTC) (the “Company” or “Astrotech”) reported its financial result for the fiscal year 2023, which ended June 30, 2023.

##### 5.11.2023- Astrotech Reports Third Quarter of Fiscal Year 2023 Financial Results

Astrotech Corporation (Nasdaq: ASTC) (the “Company” or “Astrotech”) reported its financial results for its third quarter of fiscal year 2023, which ended March 31, 2023.

[Read more](https://www.astrotechcorp.com/copy-of-2023-05-09-press-release)

##### 5.9.2023- Astrotech Announces Confirmed AgLAB, Inc. Field Trial Results

Astrotech Corporation (Nasdaq: ASTC) (the “Company” or “Astrotech”) is announcing today that its subsidiary, AgLAB, Inc., confirmed the results from field trials using the AgLAB 1000-D2 massspectrometer and the Maximum Value Process testing method (“AgLAB MVP”).

[Read more](https://www.astrotechcorp.com/copy-of-2023-05-08-press-release)

##### 5.8.2023- 1st Detect Secures Significant Purchase Order for Checkpoint Security

Astrotech Corporation (Nasdaq: ASTC) (the “Company” or “Astrotech”) announced today that st Detect subsidiary has received a 17 unit order for its TRACER 1000™ explosives trace detector (ETD). 

[Read more](https://www.astrotechcorp.com/copy-of-2023-02-10-press-release)

##### 2.10.2023- Astrotech Reports Second Quarter of Fiscal Year 2023 Financial Results

Astrotech Corporation (Nasdaq: ASTC) (the “Company” or “Astrotech”) reported its financial results for its second quarter of fiscal year 2023, which ended December 31, 2022.

[Read more](https://www.astrotechcorp.com/2023-02-10-press-release)

##### 2.06.2023- Astrotech Appoints Thomas B. Pickens III as Chief Technology Officer

Astrotech Corporation (Nasdaq: ASTC) announced today that its Board of Directors has appointed Thomas B. Pickens III to serve as its Chief Technology Officer (“CTO”) in conjunction with his current duties as Chief Executive Officer.

[Read more](https://www.astrotechcorp.com/2023-02-06-press-release)

##### 1.31.2023- Astrotech Appoints Bob McFarland to Board of Directors

Astrotech Corporation (Nasdaq: ASTC) announced today that it has increased the size of its Board of Directors from four to five directors and has appointed Bob McFarland as a director of the Company. Mr. McFarland brings to Astrotech’s Board extensive executive management experience with domestic and international enterprises, with a focus on information technology.

[Read more](https://www.astrotechcorp.com/2022-12-21-press-release)

##### 11.13.2023- 1st Detect Secures Significant Purchase Order for Additional Checkpoint Security Units

Astrotech Corporation (NASDAQ: ASTC) announced today that its 1st Detect subsidiary has accepted another significant purchase order for seven of its TRACER 1000™ explosives trace detectors (ETDs), for an airport security checkpoint. The systems will be deployed in a European airport in Romania.

[Read more](https://www.astrotechcorp.com/2023-11-13a-press-release)

##### 11.28.2023- Astrotech Presents the First Process Control System for Cannabinoid Oil Distillation Systems

Astrotech Corporation (NASDAQ: ASTC) ("Astrotech" or the "Company") and its wholly owned subsidiary, AgLAB, Inc., announce the presentation of the AgLAB Maximum Value ProcessTM (“MVPTM”) at MJBizcon.

[Read more](https://www.astrotechcorp.com/2023-11-28-press-release)

##### 12.12.2023- Astrotech Announces Exciting New Technology Application and Introduces New Subsidiary

Astrotech Corporation Announces Chemical Process Control System

[Read more](https://www.astrotechcorp.com/copy-of-2023-11-28-press-release)

bottom of page
